item.title: Configuring Docker -- Work in progress!!
item.description: Nothing to do here!! OK, decided to ditch the local config. In spite of the fact that Docker is supposed to be platform agnostic, it needs some sort of virtualization layer, so some versions of Windows are a no-go, eg Windows Home Ed. We will use Docker in Docker and use Singularity to launch it. Letâ€™s talk a little about Docker. Docker, imo, takes us to the extreme end of reproducible research.

item.title: Git Conf
item.description: Note, this is a working document describing how we will use git in this class. Every students local computing platform is different and we will see exceptions. Please do this early and let me know if you have issues and see deviations that should go on this writeup. Basically, we need to have:

item.title: Submitting homework
item.description: Homework submissions will be accomplished through GitHub. At this point, I am assuming you have worked through the Git Configuration document and successfully added the README file via the command line.
